titles.title: For the relief of Phin Cohen, M.D.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 7/12/1999--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in compensation for losses incurred as a result of providing information that enabled the United States to recoup certain misallocated Federal research grant funds.
